document_data.name: Reldegar's Roost
document_data.mainbody: e Roost was considered perhaps the worst establishment in Yhaunn, with its only saving grace being its low prices. Bill stayed out of his customer's business whenever possible, focusing on food, drink, and lodgings over any rumor-mongering or gossip-brokering.
document_data.Location: The establishment was found on the city's docks, where desperate sailors might easily find it.
document_data.Services: The Roost was considered perhaps the worst establishment in Yhaunn, with its only saving grace being its low prices. Bill stayed out of his customer's business whenever possible, focusing on food, drink, and lodgings over any rumor-mongering or gossip-brokering.
document_data.History: In the 1360s DR, [[adventurer]]s on a treasure hunt encountered the pirates [[Rufus the Cruel]] and [[Malificat]] at the Roost, as well as the [[Cormyr]]ean privateers [[Seldar]] and [[Throxis]].
